Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.attributes

Interface ActorAttribute<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseActorAttribute
public interface ActorAttribute<T>
An interface that represents an attribute of an actor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void decrease​(T points)
    Decreases the current points of the attribute by the given points.
    default void decreaseMaximum​(T points)
    Decreases the current maximum points of the attribute by the given points.
    T get()
    Getter for the current points of the attribute.
    default T getMaximum()
    Getter for the maximum points of the attribute.
    void increase​(T points)
    Increases the current points of the attribute by the given points.
    default void increaseMaximum​(T points)
    Increases the current maximum points of the attribute by the given points.
    void update​(T points)
    Overwrites the current points of the attribute with the given points.
    default void updateMaximum​(T points)
    Overwrites the current maximum points of the attribute with the given points.

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update​(T points)
      Overwrites the current points of the attribute with the given points.
      Parameters:
      points - the points to overwrite the current points of the attribute

    • increase

      void increase​(T points)
      Increases the current points of the attribute by the given points. This will add to the existing points of an attribute without overwriting the points.
      Parameters:
      points - the points to increase the current points of the attribute

    • decrease

      void decrease​(T points)
      Decreases the current points of the attribute by the given points. This will subtract from the existing points of an attribute without overwriting the points.
      Parameters:
      points - the points to decrease the current points of the attribute

    • get

      T get()
      Getter for the current points of the attribute.
      Returns:
      the current points of the attribute

    • getMaximum

      default T getMaximum()
      Getter for the maximum points of the attribute. For example, after being attacked by an enemy, the health of the current actor is less than the maximum health, e.g. (490/500). The actor will start the game with the maximum health, e.g. (500/500)
      Returns:
      the maximum points of the attribute

    • updateMaximum

      default void updateMaximum​(T points)
      Overwrites the current maximum points of the attribute with the given points. For example, after being attacked by an enemy, the health of the current actor is less than the maximum health, e.g. (490/500). The actor will start the game with the maximum health, e.g. (500/500)
      Parameters:
      points - the points to overwrite the current maximum points of the attribute

    • increaseMaximum

      default void increaseMaximum​(T points)
      Increases the current maximum points of the attribute by the given points. This will add to the existing maximum points of an attribute without overwriting the maximum points. For example, after being attacked by an enemy, the health of the current actor is less than the maximum health, e.g. (490/500). The actor will start the game with the maximum health, e.g. (500/500)
      Parameters:
      points - the points to increase the current maximum points of the attribute

    • decreaseMaximum

      default void decreaseMaximum​(T points)
      Decreases the current maximum points of the attribute by the given points. This will subtract from the existing maximum points of an attribute without overwriting the maximum points. For example, after being attacked by an enemy, the health of the current actor is less than the maximum health, e.g. (490/500). The actor will start the game with the maximum health, e.g. (500/500)
      Parameters:
      points - the points to decrease the current maximum points of the attribute
